node.hospital_zh: 雅麗氏何妙齡那打素醫院
node.hospital_en: Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital
node.detail_zh: 患者為 22 個月大嬰兒，是居於粉嶺華明邨禮明樓的第 143 宗患者的姪女　患者於 3 月 20 日開始發燒，由檢疫中心送去大埔那打素醫院，情況穩定。
node.detail_en: The patient is a 22-month-old baby, and she is the niece of patient no #143, who lives in Wah Ming Estate Lai Ming House.  She started having fever since Mar 20 and was transferred from quarantine centre to Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital.
node.classification_zh: 輸入個案的密切接觸者

node.location_en: Lai Ming House, Wah Ming Estate

node.location_zh: 雅麗氏何妙齡那打素醫院
node.location_en: Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital
node.remarks_zh: 3 月 20 日開始發燒，由檢疫中心送院，患者為個案 #143 的姪女
node.remarks_en: Developed fever since Mar 20, was sent to hospital from quarantine centre. Patient is the niece of case #143
